desc.text: The Maven repository address provided by HMS SDK will be added.
The AppGallery Connect dependency will be added.
The AppGallery Apms plugin Connect dependency will be added.
Please go to the AGC console and apply for HMS access for your app. For details, please refer to HUAWEI Mobile Service Development Guide.
Please go to the AGC console and apply for HMS apms access for your app. For details, please refer to HUAWEI Mobile Service Development Guide.
The GMS Apply plugin will be deleted.
The firebase Apply plugin will be deleted.
